meanings.definition: An animal of the group Metazoa, comprising all multicellular animals except the sponges.
meanings.sent1: The metazoans in the zoo fascinated the children with their diverse shapes and colors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study metazoans to understand how different species interact in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The metazoans threw a party in the jungle, celebrating their unity as multicellular creatures.
meanings.sent4: The city at night was a bustling metropolis, a metazoan of lights and sounds.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the metazoans revealed intricate details of their cellular structure.
